Defined class DevelopmentConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Development configuration.

class app_server.configuration.mail.development_config.DevelopmentConfig[source]

Bases: app_server.configuration.mail.BaseConfig

Defined class DevelopmentConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Development configuration. It defines:

attributes
MAIL_USERNAME - mail username (sender).
MAIL_PASSWORD - mail password (sender).
MAIL_RECIPIENT - mail username (recipient).
methods
None
MAIL_PASSWORD = 'g_sender_password'
MAIL_RECIPIENT = 'm.receiver@outlook.com'
MAIL_USERNAME = 'g.sender@gmail.com'
